target_markets.market_description: Children and young teens with disposable income from parents
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Mass market appeal across multiple product categories simultaneously

problems_validated.problem: Children's desire for social status and peer recognition
problems_validated.current_solutions: Traditional toys and games in single categories
problems_validated.market_gap: No integrated ecosystem spanning games, media, and collectibles

products_tools.name: Pokemon Trading Cards
products_tools.use_case: Status symbol and social hierarchy establishment

business_strategies.strategy: Multi-surface area approach - hitting multiple product categories simultaneously
business_strategies.implementation: Launch coordinated products across gaming, television, and collectibles
business_strategies.expected_results: Creates ecosystem lock-in and multiple revenue streams
business_strategies.case_study: Pokemon's coordinated launch of Game Boy games, TV show, and trading cards

business_strategies.strategy: Artificial scarcity and status hierarchy through rare collectibles
business_strategies.implementation: Create premium rare items (holographic cards) that establish social status
business_strategies.expected_results: Drives premium purchasing and social sharing
business_strategies.case_study: Holographic Charizard card as 'local warlord' status symbol

business_strategies.implementation: Use daily TV show to teach product knowledge through interactive segments
business_strategies.case_study: 'Who's that Pokemon' TV show segments teaching character recognition

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Fragmented entertainment experiences and social status anxiety
startup_ideas.business_model: Multiple revenue streams across gaming, media, and physical products
startup_ideas.validation: Test coordinated launch across 2-3 product categories

growth_tactics.results_expected: Product knowledge building and daily engagement
Organic social sharing and status-driven purchasing

trends_signals.opportunity: Create integrated ecosystems across multiple product categories
Leverage social hierarchy desires for premium product positioning

actionable_quotes.quote: the coolest thing in a Pokemon was it hit multiple surface areas at once
actionable_quotes.actionability: Design products that span multiple categories simultaneously

actionable_quotes.quote: if you get a holographic Charizard you're basically a local warlord
actionable_quotes.context: Describing the social status impact of rare collectibles
actionable_quotes.actionability: Create premium rare items that establish clear social hierarchy
